text.tspan: People living in democracies and non-democracies, World
Based on the classification and assessment by Boix et al. (2013). Democracies are understood here as
political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad right to vote for men and women in
Data source: OWID based on Boix et al. (2013); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2019)
